name: Crispy Potato Pancakes
author: maf13456
summary: Need a tasty side for any meal of the day? These are the route to go. I tried this recipe in my culinary class and they were amazing! Everyone raved about their excellent texture and flavor!
ingredients: 2 pounds potatoes, peeled and coarsely shredded
1 pinch ground nutmeg, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Mix potatoes, onions, eggs, flour, baking powder, and lemon juice in a large bowl; season with nutmeg, salt, and black pepper
Shape potato mixture into 12 evenly sized patties
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Pan-fry potato patties in batches until tender and browned on both sides, 7 to 10 minutes
Transfer browned patties to a paper towel-lined baking sheet
